description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Cro-Mag Rally is the wildest kart racing game since man invented the wheel!  You are a speed-hungry caveman named Brog who races through the Stone, Bronze, and Iron Ages in primitive vehicles with plenty of weapons to fend off your opponents!
description.short: Cro-Mag Rally is the wildest kart racing game since man invented the wheel!  You are a speed-hungry caveman named Brog who races through the Stone, Bronze, and Iron Ages in primitive vehicles with plenty of weapons to fend off your opponents!
